00011 // translucent.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "material.h"
00014 // Translucent Class Declarations
00015 class Translucent : public Material {
00016 public:
00017         // Translucent Public Methods
00018         Translucent(Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > kd, Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > ks,
00019                         Reference<Texture<float> > rough,
00020                         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > refl,
00021                         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > trans,
00022                         Reference<Texture<float> > bump) {
00023                 Kd = kd;
00024                 Ks = ks;
00025                 roughness = rough;
00026                 reflect = refl;
00027                 transmit = trans;
00028                 bumpMap = bump;
00029         }
00030         BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const;
00031 private:
00032         // Translucent Private Data
00033         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kd, Ks;
00034         Reference<Texture<float> > roughness;
00035         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > reflect, transmit;
00036         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap;
00037 };
00038 // Translucent Method Definitions
00039 BSDF *Translucent::GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const {
00040         // Allocate _BSDF_, possibly doing bump-mapping with _bumpMap_
00041         DifferentialGeometry dgs;
00042         if (bumpMap)
00043                 Bump(bumpMap, dgGeom, dgShading, &dgs);
00044         else
00045                 dgs = dgShading;
00046         BSDF *bsdf = BSDF_ALLOC(BSDF)(dgs, dgGeom.nn);
00047         Spectrum r = reflect->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00048         Spectrum t = transmit->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00049         if (r.Black() && t.Black()) return bsdf;
00050 
00051         Spectrum kd = Kd->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00052         if (!kd.Black()) {
00053                 if (!r.Black()) bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(Lambertian)(r * kd));
00054                 if (!t.Black()) bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(BRDFToBTDF)(BSDF_ALLOC(Lambertian)(t * kd)));
00055         }
00056         Spectrum ks = Ks->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00057         if (!ks.Black()) {
00058                 float rough = roughness->Evaluate(dgs);
00059                 if (!r.Black()) {
00060                         Fresnel *fresnel = BSDF_ALLOC(FresnelDielectric)(1.5f, 1.f);
00061                         bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(Microfacet)(r * ks, fresnel,
00062                                 BSDF_ALLOC(Blinn)(1.f / rough)));
00063                 }
00064                 if (!t.Black()) {
00065                         Fresnel *fresnel = BSDF_ALLOC(FresnelDielectric)(1.5f, 1.f);
00066                         bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(BRDFToBTDF)(BSDF_ALLOC(Microfacet)(t * ks, fresnel,
00067                                 BSDF_ALLOC(Blinn)(1.f / rough))));
00068                 }
00069         }
00070         return bsdf;
00071 }
00072 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Material * CreateMaterial(const Transform &xform,
00073                 const TextureParams &mp) {
00074         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kd = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("Kd", Spectrum(1.f));
00075         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Ks = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("Ks", Spectrum(1.f));
00076         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > reflect = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("reflect", Spectrum(0.5f));
00077         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > transmit = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("transmit", Spectrum(0.5f));
00078         Reference<Texture<float> > roughness = mp.GetFloatTexture("roughness", .1f);
00079         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap = mp.GetFloatTexture("bumpmap", 0.f);
00080         return new Translucent(Kd, Ks, roughness, reflect, transmit, bumpMap);
00081 }
